title: Bug 10403: Confirmation needed for project creation to clean the 'bin' directory
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should confirm that the output directory ('bin') can be deleted and rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder at a 'bin' directory which contains more than just '.class' files, and can be rebuilt from the available '.java' files.
EB: When creating a project, the user should be prompted to confirm the deletion and rebuilding of the 'bin' directory.
